author: vkuznet
body:
This will create python link to python3 and avoid headache in all python based packages which should pick up proper version of python via various constructs, e.g.
```
#!/usr/bin/env python
```
or
```
python /path/file.py
```
The new link will ensure that code will call python3 rather then python. And, this will only be valid for packages which will explicitly depend on python3.
title: Make python link to python3
